name: Wemos Foundation
membership: Wemos is a member of the Medicus Mundi International (MMI) network, the Peoples Health Movement (PHM), the European Public Health Alliance (EPHA), Health Action International (HAI) and several Dutch networks on the topic of global health and health governance.
memberOrga: Wemos is not a member organisation. The number above refers to supporters of the organisation, who support Wemos financially. In addition, Wemos has a newsletter which has around 1000 subscribers.
goal:
Wemos influences (inter)national policy in such a way that the right to health is respected, protected and promoted. Wemos contributes to policy changes aimed at making structural improvements in health for all. We advocate for:

ethical conduct,
coherent and fair policy, and
health equity.

By applying a global perspective on health.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Development, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Wemos has recently completed the project Health Workers for all and all for health workers; we work on human resources for health, health governance and financing; ethical clinical trials; legislation regarding endocrine disrupting chemicals.
